POI.info: Hit the corner to hit two walls at the same time.
Shoot at the cliff to hit the wall above.
Shoot towards Durios Gulch. The splash damage of the catapult shot will hit the wall.
Aim into the corner to hit both walls at the same time.
Aim into the corner to hit both walls at the same time.

Start by aiming the catapult into the corner between the two walls to hit both at the same time.
When the walls are down you can turn the catapult to aim at the inner gate.

Start by aiming the catapult into the corner between the two walls to hit both at the same time.
When the walls are down you can turn the catapult to aim at the inner gate.
This is a very exposed catapult and generally not recommended. It is however useful in some situations and you will be hitting two walls at the same time.
Place the catapult as close to the corner as you can as it will be more difficult to hit for defenders on the walls.
Place the catapult as close to the corner as you can as it will be more difficult to hit for defenders on the walls.

Start by aiming the catapult into the corner between the two walls to hit both at the same time.
When the walls are down you can turn the catapult to aim at the inner gate.
This is a very exposed catapult and generally not recommended. It is however useful in some situations and you will be hitting two walls at the same time.
Aim into the pillar on Stonemist to hit both walls at the same time.

Start by aiming the catapult into the corner between the two walls to hit both at the same time.
When the walls are down you can turn the catapult to aim at the inner gate.
This is a very exposed catapult and generally not recommended. We recommend you use the catapult spot behind.

Shoot straight ahead and you will hit the wall with splash damage.
About 50% charge.
Beware the ease at which the enemies can hit you with Arrow Cart fire in this location.
Aim into the cliff below the bridge to hit Veloka Slope's wall with splash damage.
Try to aim at the pillars between the walls so you can hit two walls at a time.
Aim into the cliff to hit the wall with splash damage.
Shoot at the gate to hit enemies attacking the gate with Flame Rams.
Aim towards Anzalias Pass to hit its outer wall.
Aim towards Durios Gulch to hit its outer wall.
You can hit both the outer wall and the inner wall with this trebuchet. The arrow on the ground is the direction at which you can hit the inner wall.
Yes, you can hit the outer wall of the keep from here with a trebuchet.
Aim towards Overlook keep to hit its outer wall.
Aim towards Stonemist Castle to hit its outer wall.
Aim towards Stonemist Castle to hit its outer wall.
Aim towards Stonemist Castle to hit its outer wall.
Aim towards the keep to hit its outer wall.
Aim towards Wildcreek Run to hit its wall.
You can use this trebuchet to either attack Anzalias Pass or defend against catapults and trebuchets on top of the cliff.
Shoot towards attackers inside the Ogre camp.
